amendment.description: To amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to develop and maintain a list of vessels and vessel owners engaged in illegal, unreported, or unregulated fishing, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3312 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3312 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S12913-12914) To amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to develop and maintain a list of vessels and vessel owners engaged in illegal, unreported, or unregulated fishing, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3312 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3312 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
